title: I Had Enough! Let’s Break Up - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Broken Engagement   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   College/University   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day
author: 单推斩首
description:
“Eh, you know what? My best friend quarreled with her boyfriend again, her boyfriend was reluctant to buy a milk tea for her, unlike you, who would go through four or five stores under the sun to get the milk tea I want”

“It’s nothing, it’s what I should do as a boyfriend.”

“Great! I really feel now that you are the only one in this world who can understand me, we will always be like this, right?”

Lin ShouJie looked at the girlfriend in front of him who had never cared about him once and said the words that had been buried in his heart for a long time.>
